catalog_script_client.name: Set Start date Catalog Version

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_11a8f9671b1c1d90b1d29cef034bcba1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rental Request">91b705541b9851505e1184c6cc4bcbd4</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:b1b7c9541b9851505e1184c6cc4bcb02</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set Start date Catalog Version</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

	var today_date = new Date();
	var today_date_str = formatDate(today_date, g_user_date_format); 
		
    if (g_form.getValue('start_date') < today_date_str) {
        g_form.showFieldMsg('start_date', '시작 날짜는 오늘보다 미래이어야 한다.', 'error');
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-01 08:08:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>11a8f9671b1c1d90b1d29cef034bcba1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Start date Catalog Version</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Rental Service" source="x_tigar_rental_ser">28d3b8441b9cdd105e1184c6cc4bcbd6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Rental Service">28d3b8441b9cdd105e1184c6cc4bcbd6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_11a8f9671b1c1d90b1d29cef034bcba1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-01 08:09:29</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
